Summary: looked small like star turned entered atmosphere flew directly overhead
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Newberg
There were no other sightings in Newberg on or around August 13th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were watching persius meteor shower. We saw what we refer to as moving stars we see them often then we saw a flashing in the sky almost like sheet lightning but there were no clouds right after the flash a moving star would get bright like a florescent light it entered our atmosphere then most would just disappear light bulb just gone once we saw a plane flying then a flash close to the plane it quickly changed its heading and left then we saw another moving star it turned fast then entered our atmosphere it flew closer to us it was right overhead we could see three bright lights no noise we saw a cone shaped craft literally 50 feet overhead I was scared ready to run then it flickered and it was gone impossible if my daughter who is 18 wasn't with me I would not believe it at all we do see what is small as stars that move quickly and suddenly get super bright like it enters the atmosphere I never believed in UFOs until now
